title: Celebrities take the stage at the 2017 Oscars
text: Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Celebrities take the stage at the 2017 Oscars Janelle Monae, Taraji P. Henson and Octavia Spencer introduce NASA physicist and mathematician Katherine Johnson during the 89th Academy Awards. Henson and Octavia Spencer introduce NASA physicist and mathematician Katherine Johnson during the 89th Academy Awards. Robert Deutsch, USA TODAY Jimmy Kimmel speaks during the 89th Academy Awards. Robert Deutsch, USA TODAY None Janelle Monae, left, Taraji P. Henson and Octavia Spencer, right, introduce NASA physicist and mathematician Katherine Johnson during the 89th Academy Awards. Robert Deutsch, USA TODAY None Caroline Waterlow and Ezra Edelman accept the award for Best documentary feature 'O.J.: Made in America' during the 89th Academy Awards. Robert Deutsch, USA TODAY None Giorgio Gregorini, left, Alessandro Bertolazzi and Christopher Nelson, right, accept the award for Achievement in makeup and hairstyling for 'Suicide Squad' during the 89th Academy Awards. Robert Deutsch, USA TODAY None Colleen Atwood accepts the Oscar for Achievement in costume design for 'Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them' during the 89th Academy Awards. Robert Deutsch, USA TODAY None Kate McKinnon and Jason Bateman present the award for Achievement in makeup and hairstyling during the 89th Academy Awards. Robert Deutsch, USA TODAY None Mahershala Ali accepts the the Oscar for Best Supporting Actor for his role in 'Moonlight' during the 89th Academy Awards. Robert Deutsch, USA TODAY Alicia Vikander presents the award for best supporting actor during the 89th Academy Awards. Robert Deutsch, USA TODAY Meryl Streep stands to the applause of the crowd during the 89th Academy Awards.
